sample.MainFacade

type
class
extends
primevc.mvc.Facade<MainEventsMainModelprimevc.core.traits.IDisposableMainControllerMainView>
MainFacade is the core class of the application. It corresponds to the facade of the MVC model. MainFacade initializes the main parts of the application (model, view, controller) and provides a main access point for them. Acting as a binding component it allows to separate the model from the view, thus separating data from UI elements respectively.
